Package de.fu.scetris.scheduler.genetic Description

Provides one concrete implementation of a strategy to run the genetic algorithm for scheduling. This implementation has many parameters to adjust the procedure of the algorithm execution. Initialization is done randomly.

Since:
Iteration 2
